ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 538
ygData.msgSnippet: hehe well When I was at the Bazaar this morning 5am EST there were something like 238 peeps in zone and a guildy said that there were only a baker s dozen of
ygData.messageBody:
hehe well When I was at the Bazaar this morning 5am EST there were something
like 238 peeps in zone and a guildy said that there were only a baker's
dozen of peeps in NFP.

Cynfyn MacCulloch 51 DESK
Halyburton Bearhugger 28 BarbShm
Saltaque 12 HIEEnch
Qapmoc 11 HalfElf Ranger
Oroblram 9 Hu War
Doktari 6 HIE Cleric
Defender of the Faith
Saryn Server
DoF Email list: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/DoFGuild/

----- Original Message -----
From: "Sheri Kendall" <skendall@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 25, 2002 0905
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 538


> /bazaar mode, and not having to spam a zone endlessly and ask a million
> times "how much?" or "stats please"
>
> /drool
>
> checked it out on the test server b4, and finally got it all downloaded at
> like 3am last night when the congestion got better
> This mornin 7:30am est 237 ppl in bazaar
>
zone--------------------------laaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa
> aaagggggggggggggggggggg-
> that's the only thing that's gonna suck about it :(
>
>
